name: First In Flight: A North Carolina Retrospective
description: FIRST IN FLIGHT: “A North Carolina Retrospective” DVD documents the past through the present rise of North Carolina’s metal, hardcore, punk and indie music scenes. This double disc DVD features pro-shot live show footage, interviews, behind the scenes “shenanigans” and bonus audio/video sections. Pivotal acts included: Between The Buried And Me, Hopesfall, Catharsis, Bloodjinn, Codeseven, Prayer For Cleansing, killwhitneydead, Undying, Day Of Suffering and more. Without a doubt, “FIRST IN FLIGHT: “A North Carolina Retrospective” is a must have for any hardcore, metal, punk and indie rock fan! Features: Alli With An I Beloved Between The Buried And Me Blankface Bloodjinn Blown Apart Bastards Catharsis Cherry Valence Choke Their Rivers… Choose Your Weapon Codeseven Crimson Spectre Day of Suffering The Demonstration The Driver Each Passing Moment Farewell From Here On Glass Casket He Is Legend Hopesfall Idea Of Beauty The Kickass Kerbloki Kill Whitney Dead Kudzu Wish Ladderback The Manhattan Project Naked Angels The Necessary Opportunity Or Obstacle Pink Collar Jobs Prayer For Cleansing Quell Red Orchestra Radio Red With Vengeance Secret Lives Of The Freemasons Scarlet Undercover Sever The Tie Sleep Comes Later Social Phobia Sullivan Swift Thunderlip Undying Utah! Uwharria Valient Thorr XTride N TrueX Zegota + more FIRST IN FLIGHT TRAILER

name: SeriesDVD Metal And Hardcore Volumes 1 - 6
description: All six volumes of SeriesDVD Metal and Hardcore dvds for one low price.

name: SeriesDVD Metal And Hardcore Volume 5
description: FEATURING: SICK OF IT ALL, AGNOSTIC FRONT, NORMA JEAN, SEVENTH STAR, HIMSA, DROWNINGMAN, HIGH ON FIRE, SWARM OF THE LOTUS, UNDEROATH, BURST, CEPHALIC CARNAGE, MISERY SIGNALS, INKED IN BLOOD, OLD FASHION KNIFE FIGHT, SPITFIRE, A LIFE ONCE LOST, FROM A SECOND STORY WINDOW, COLUMNS, A SCANNER DARKLY, NODES OF RANVIER, DREAMSCAPES OF THE PERVERSE, ICONOCLAST THEORY & DAMONA WAITS SeriesDVD Volume 5 TRAILER
